---
title: "Crystal Lewis Resume"
author: Crystal Lewis
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: true
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'custom.css',  'resume']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
library(googlesheets4)
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

#require(devtools)
#install_version("googlesheets4", version = "0.1.0")
# issues with 'sheets_deauth' not being in newest googlesheets4 version

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LU3QPm4eVbUZcZCAWLs8FzM2OxmyeVWSV0HAMofamSo/edit#gid=917338460",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
)

CV$entries_data <- CV$entries_data %>% dplyr::filter(in_resume == TRUE)

```


```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
